test.name: Register With Valid Username And Password

kw.name: Create User And Input Login Command
Create User
kw.doc: This keyword creates a new user with the specified username and password.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Creating user with username: ${username} and password: ${password}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Creating user with username: kalle and password: kalle123

kw.name: Create User
kw.doc: This keyword creates a new user with the specified username and password.

kw.name: Log
kw.arg: Creating user with username: ${username} and password: ${password}
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Creating user with username: validuser and password: validPassword123

kw.name: Output Should Contain
kw.doc: This keyword checks if the expected output is present in the response or UI after submitting the credentials.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: Checking if output contains: User created successfully

test.doc: This test verifies that a user can successfully register with a valid username and password.
